DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine best rate infusion amino acid ( 15 % CLINISOL - sulfite-free ( Amino Acid ) Injection ) nutrition subject stag II IVB head neck cancer .
DOC.brief_title: Dosing Study Amino Acids Seriously Ill Patients
DOC.criteria: Have Stages II IVB head neck cancer receive radiation may also receive chemotherapy . * Subjects eligible inclusion study regardless primary Stages II IVB head neck cancer treatment modality ( eg , surgery , chemotherapy ) . Have voluntarily sign date write informed consent form ( ICF ) nature study explain . Female subject must non childbearing potential ( define postmenopausal least 1 year surgically sterile [ bilateral tubal ligation , bilateral oophorectomy hysterectomy ] ) ; Female subject childbearing potential must use adequate contraception ( practice 1 follow method birth control ) : total abstinence sexual intercourse ( minimum 1 complete menstrual cycle study entry ) , vasectomized partner , contraceptive ( oral , parenteral , transdermal ) 3 consecutive month prior study drug administration , intrauterine device ( IUD ) , double barrier method ( condom , sponge , diaphragm , vaginal ring spermicidal jelly cream ) . Female subject must negative serum urinary pregnancy test result screening ( serum specimen must obtain within 14 day prior baseline ) . Had loss > 10 % body weight within 3 month period prior study note subject medical history chart . Have renal disease determine estimate glomerular filtration rate ( eGFR ) < 30 mL/min/1.73m2 . Have hemoglobin level < 9 g/dl . Have Stage 0 , I , IVC metastatic cancer . Have diabetes . Have reason , opinion Investigator , would prevent subject safely participate study . Have , opinion Investigator , dependence alcohol . Have , opinion Investigator , dependence illicit drug .
